SEARCH
Package careerhub.storage

Class DataManager

java.lang.Object
careerhub.storage.DataManager
public class DataManager extends Object
Central coordinator for all data-related operations.

The DataManager acts as the façade of the storage layer, providing a unified API for the rest of the system (menus and services). Internally, it composes:

  • In-memory repositories (UserRepository, InternshipRepository, ApplicationRepository)
  • Data services for domain logic (UserDataService, InternshipDataService, ApplicationDataService)
  • CSV persistence management (CsvPersistenceService)

All higher-level logic (menus, services) depend only on DataManager, achieving loose coupling and clean layering.
